name: Super Malley World
description:
Super Malley World is a new 3D Platformer level developed in Unreal Engine 4. Run and jump through a mushroom riddled mountain to collect all 6 stars and win the game!

This game level is a prototype and proof of concept for a potentially fully made game. If this game is popular and there is enough interest, I may continue development on it. If you liked the game please consider leaving a rating or comment for it.
